thread.title: Great central location first class customer service
thread.title_full: Great central location first class customer service - Review of Cambria hotel & suites New York - Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jeff E
title: Great central location first class customer service
text: My wife and I stayed here for one night before we left for Scotland. It is very close to Time Square and only two blocks from a subway station. The room itself was nicely appointed and a good size by New York City standards. The front desk was a very helpful providing directions and recommendations for places to eat. Everything is within easy walking distance there are diners next door and a Starbucks across the street. Checking in and out was prompt and friendly period I would recommend this place without hesitation and will likely stay here again in July.
